#summary iStock Search Show My Data (Royalties and Downloads)
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Shows additional data for file downloads and royalties in  search pages.


= Details =

Upon visiting a lightbox search page, a button will show. Clicking it will display downloads and royalties for each result you own on that page with a final tally at the top.

Additionally per month graph data will be shown for current search page results.

= Download =

Click [http://code.google.com/p/istock-greasemonkey-tools/downloads/detail?name=IS_search_showMyData.user.js HERE] to get the script.
